name: Beta 0.11.2
body:
Bugfixes:

- Fixed issues related to the Windows 10 1803 update. Thanks for reporting them and thanks to @chpock for supplying a fix.

name: Beta 0.11.1
body:
Bugfixes:

- Improved Table of Content's structure in the documentation
- Fixed tooltip on taskbar icon not updating after dekstop name change at runtime (thanks @achim-t for reporting it)

name: Beta 0.11.0
body:
New features:

- Now you can rename desktops at runtime by using a new customizable key combination (Thanks to @achim-t for the suggestion)

Bugfixes:

- Improved window focus management:
  - Full-screen windows do not exit full-screen mode anymore (Thanks to @nuteguy for the bug report)
  - The flashing orange taskbar icons glitch should not happen anymore
  - There should be less problems relative to windows not receiving focus after a desktop switch

name: Beta 0.10.5
body:
Bugfixes:

- Made it so you can scroll on taskbars other than the main one to switch between desktops (fixes #61, thanks to achim-t).

name: Beta 0.10.4
body:
New features:
- Improved tooltip customization (horizontal and vertical positioning, fade-out) (thanks to GioBonvi for the PR and suggestion)
- Tooltips can be displayed on all monitors (thanks to GioBonvi for the PR, and to as14 for their suggestion in #6)

name: Beta 0.10.3
body:
New features:
- Made it possible to select whether or not you want to desktops to wrap around when using the "previous" and "next" actions (#44, thanks to GioBonvi for the PR, thanks to drewnoakes for the suggestion).

name: Beta 0.10.2
body:
New features:
- Made it possible to run programs when switching to/from each desktop. Please see the README for details.

name: Beta 0.10.1
body:
New features:
- Made the keyboard shortcuts that target a specific desktop customizable. They default to the number keys (above the letters on your keyboard) and the Numpad number keys.

name: Beta 0.10.0
body:
New features:
- Added the ability to pin windows and apps. This makes them visible in all of your virtual desktops. Thanks again to mlabaj (Martin Labaj) for his PR.
- Reworked the configuration of keyboard shortcuts, mostly to make it easier to introduce new ones.
- Made it possible to configure the keyboard shortcut to open the desktop manager.
- Made it optional to override the default Windows keyboard shortcut to switch to the next/previous desktop if the keyboard shortcut settings conflict (because they match). 

Bugfixes:
- The `Ctrl` key is no longer programmatically pressed when performing certain actions, depending on the settings.

Other changes:
- The structure of the settings file changed a bit (the names and locations of some settings changed). Please see the settings migration guide in the README for help.

For any questions about the changes, please refer to the README.

name: Beta 0.9.1
body:
Bugfixes:
- Fixed an issue that made it so the "Enabled" settings for tooltips would not work as intended (issue [#17](https://github.com/sdias/win-10-virtual-desktop-enhancer/issues/17)).

name: Beta 0.9.0
body:
New features:
- Added an extra modifier which will make all actions affect desktops 11-20 instead (for more details check the readme).

Bugfixes:
- Fixed an issue where it would exit the desktop management screen when hovering over desktop thumbnails.

name: Beta 0.8.1
body: Minor fix to prevent an error about max hotkeys being pressed to appear.

name: Beta 0.8
body:
Added customizable desktop names.
Added ability to switch desktops by scrolling over the taskbar.
Added customizable tooltips that show the desktop name when switching desktops.

For details on the usage of these features please check the readme.

NOTE: Since version 0.7 this app requires you to have the Windows 10 Anniversary update.

name: Beta 0.7
body:
Added support for moving windows between desktops.
Added new keyboard shortcuts, and the ability to customize them.
For details on the usage of both features please check the readme.

Also I'm no longer packing the wallpapers, and the wallpaper configuration is empty so it doesn't change your wallpapers when you first run it.

NOTE: This app now requires you to have the Windows 10 Anniversary update.

name: Beta 0.6.2
body:
Fixes a bug that happened when trying to use an image file as a wallpaper and the image's full path was used.
BREAKING: Changed the way that fixed color desktop backgrounds are configured.

NOTE: From now on, if you use a fixed color as a desktop background, you need to add "0x" before the hex for the color (ex: if you previously had "1=FF0000" now you need to change it to "1=0xFF0000").

NOTE: If the app doesn't work for you, please download the patch and extract it in the app's folder, replacing files as necessary.

name: Beta 0.6.1
body:
Updated rob3110's icon pack to include the fixed #10 desktop icon. Thanks again.

NOTE: If the app doesn't work for you, please download the patch and extract it in the app's folder, replacing files as necessary.

name: Beta 0.6
body:
Added support for specifying the default desktop when launching. Thanks to quasimodoca for the suggestion.

NOTE: If the app doesn't work for you, please download the patch and extract it in the app's folder, replacing files as necessary.

name: Beta 0.5
body:
Added support for fixed color backgrounds. Please check the readme for details. Thanks to FatFaceRikky for the suggestion.

NOTE: If the app doesn't work for you, please download the patch and extract it in the app's folder, replacing files as necessary.

name: Beta 0.4
body:
Added support for a tenth screen (thanks for the suggestion dAKirby309).
Added a new white icon theme (thanks rob3110).
Simplified the installation process.

NOTE: If the app doesn't work for you, please download the patch and extract it in the app's folder, replacing files as necessary.
